markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Net Launcher](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1100)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 65</row>

**Price** 16 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 2

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This wide, hollow tube is two to three feet long and fires an unattached [net](/Equipment.aspx?ID=681) at much greater range than one can be thrown. A net launcher can be wielded while propped up on your shoulder or cradled under your arm. A net must be carefully folded to be launched without tangling. Properly loading a net into a net launcher takes 1 minute. A net fired with a net launcher can target a Medium or smaller creature within 40 feet, rather than 20 feet.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Net Launcher
